name: Infuriating Driver
description:
This is my submission for the Mildly Infuriating Jam (https://itch.io/jam/mildly-infuriating-jam). The point of the jam is to encourage rage quitting while meeting the theme of "Destruction." 

Description: 

A top-down driving game where you are tasked with driving a car and trying to hit as many orange barrels as possible while not driving on the shoulder of the road or hitting the concrete barriers in the road. Be warned though - you may not be able to avoid every barrier!

Controls:

Use Arrow Keys to move the car
Hit the Orange Barrels for Points
Avoid the Road Barriers

Assets Used:

Car - 3D Low Poly Car for Games by Ruslan
Road/Grass/Pond - Low Poly City from Viuletti
Barrels/Barriers - 3D Game Props by Wissam El Hajj
Car Controller Script - Top Down Car Race Starter Kit by MAD Entertainment
Background Music - Big Casual & Arcade Game Music Bundle by Mus Station Productions
Sound Effects - Casual Game SFX Pack by Zach Striefel

NOTE: Turns out, there is a known bug with this version of Unity where audio is not played for WebGL builds. Very disappointing as I finally had time to add music and sound effects for once.
